JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Voxen Technology is currently seeking new colleagues for our CNC milling team, Humlebæk, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Voxen Technology is currently seeking new colleagues for our CNC milling team. We are a dynamic, solution-oriented, and innovative company with a focus on adding value to our customers, specifically within the following industries: Aerospace & Defence, Medical, Food, and Industrial Technology. The company is located in Humlebæk, 30 minutes from Copenhagen City.

Voxen is a professional manufacturing company with core competencies in CNC turning and milling. Our machinery includes advanced CNC-controlled milling machines (Hermle) and lathes where we produce high-end components and documentation. We manufacture prototypes, handle serial production, and deliver based on framework agreements. Additionally, we carry out complete reconstructions, optimizations, and the manufacture of new machines for industries such as Food, Medical, and laboratory use.

We offer flexible working hours and operate in 3-shift schedules, allowing you to choose how your work hours will be structured.

The Job

You will be an important player with influence in a company where the organizational structure is flat, and your opinions and input for improvements and optimizations are considered. In this position, you will be responsible for programming, commissioning, manufacturing, and quality assurance of customer-specific tasks.

Your Qualifications

  • You have a background as an industrial technician, toolmaker, or similar
  • You have several years of relevant experience with 3 and 5-axis CNC turning
  • You have experience with operating Fanuc and Siemens control systems
  • Strong skills in MasterCAM and/or hyperMILL from OpenMind

Your Profile

  • You value your team highly and are a good "Wingman"
  • You wish to develop your skills
  • You want to work with complex designs and materials
  • You want to actively contribute to the development of Voxen Technology

We Offer

An intellectually stimulating and challenging job in a dynamic company. Regarding professional development, we consider the individual employee's wishes and competencies, which is why we offer:

  • Competitive salary based on qualifications
  • Independence with responsibility
  • Pension scheme and health insurance
  • Employee benefits such as (lunch scheme, mobile phone, etc.)
  • Good working environment with great colleagues
  • Full-time position with flexible working hours

Application

 Apply for the position by uploading your CV and cover letter to rrf@voxentechnology.com. If you have any questions about the position, feel free to contact René Fleischer at +45 24818120.

Start date: As soon as possible.

About Voxen Technology ApS

With an ambitious growth strategy, Voxen Technology manufactures complex CNC-machined products in all types of materials, complete machines, and laboratory equipment. We are certified in AS9100D/9001:2015. The company is located in Humlebæk and is naturally curious as an organization, always looking for new and smarter ways to do things.

Voxen values maintaining a flat organization where there is an opportunity to realize your potential with a strong sense of belonging. www.voxentechnology.com
